messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] laughter
messages.msgSnippet: glad we gave you a *G* :) good news about your ds and dbil, that s so neat ...  you ll be able to give the newbies a LOT of help and support, I m sure :) Pris
messages.messageBody:
glad we gave you a *G* :)

good news about your ds and dbil, that's so neat ... you'll be able to give
the newbies a LOT of help and support, I'm sure :)

Pris ~> who'z hoping you/dch will feel better SOON and ohhhhhh, try to go to
bed early tonight and tomorrow will be a better day ...
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...

From: <Jaam1224@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 05, 2000 7:22 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] laughter

BTW, a follow-up to my sister....she and her hubby let the school bus go by

Julie
